[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@imhonglu/format](./format.md) &gt; [FullDate](./format.fulldate.md)

## FullDate class

The FullDate formatter based on RFC 3339.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FullDate 
```

## Example


```ts
FullDate.parse("2021-01-01");
// { year: 2021, month: 1, day: 1 }
```
